key_risks: Environmental and regulatory challenges, including contamination issues and stringent zoning regulations
Financial pressures from market volatility and operational losses
Community opposition to high-density developments and limited affordable housing initiatives
controversies: Legal battles and settlements over Hunters Point contamination
Rejection of a $5.4 million settlement by a federal judge
environmental_issues: Delays due to environmental and zoning regulations
social_issues: Limited scale of affordable housing compared to market-rate developments
governance_issues: Dependence on third-party partnerships for project execution
